scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/mysite/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/mysite
  set jcr:title{String} to "My Site 6.5"
end

create service user writeruser 
set ACL on /content 
 allow jcr:read for writeruser 
end

set ACL on /content 
allow jcr:all for writeruser 
end

set ACL on /var 
allow jcr:all for writeruser 
end

set ACL on /conf 
allow jcr:all for writeruser 
end
